service.name: createWorkEffortAndPartyAssign
service.description: Create a WorkEffort Entity and assign to a party

service.name: copyWorkEffort
service.description: Copies an existing WorkEffort to a new WorkEffort.

attribute.name: sourceWorkEffortId
attribute.description: The ID of the WorkEffort to copy from.

attribute.name: targetWorkEffortId
attribute.description: The ID of the WorkEffort copy. If empty a new WorkEffort ID will be created.

attribute.name: copyWorkEffortAssocs
attribute.description: Copy WorkEffort associations (Y/N). Only child WorkEffort associations will be copied.

attribute.name: deepCopy
attribute.description: Copy associated WorkEfforts (Y/N). Used only when copyWorkEffortAssocs = Y.

attribute.name: excludeExpiredAssocs
attribute.description: Exclude expired associated WorkEfforts from copying (Y/N). Used only when copyWorkEffortAssocs = Y.

attribute.name: excludeExpiredRelations
attribute.description: Exclude expired WorkEffort related values from copying (Y/N). Used only when copyRelatedValues = Y.

service.name: duplicateWorkEffort
service.description: Duplicate a Work Effort. If workEffortId is empty a new workEffortId will be generated.

service.name: makeCommunicationEventWorkEffort
service.description: Make a Communication Event Workeffort and create the workeffort itself if the ID not supplied

service.name: deletePartyToWorkEffortAssignment
service.description: delete/set the thrudate on the WorkEffortPartyAssignment Entity to today

service.name: quickAssignPartyToWorkEffort
service.description: Quick Assign Party To WorkEffort as Owner

service.name: quickAssignPartyToWorkEffortWithRole
service.description: Quick Assign Party To WorkEffort as Owner

service.name: getWorkEffortAssignedEventsForRole
service.description: Get the active WorkEffort Events where the logged in user is assigned in the specidied role.

service.name: getWorkEffortAssignedEventsForRoleOfAllParties
service.description: Get the active WorkEffort Events in the specified role for all the parties.

service.name: getWorkEffortAssignedTasks
service.description: Get WorkEffort Assigned Tasks : workEffort assign to userLogin.partyId and with workEffortTypeId = TASK and currentStatusId not in (CAL_DECLINED, CAL_DELEGATED, CAL_COMPLETED, CAL_CANCELLED) and partyAssign.statusId != PRTYASGN_UNASSIGNED OR workEffortTypeId = PROD_ORDER_TASK and currentStatusId not in (PRUN_CANCELLED, PRUN_COMPLETED, PRUN_CLOSED)

service.name: getWorkEffortAssignedActivities
service.description: Get WorkEffort Assigned Activities : workEffort assign to userLogin.partyId and with workEffortTypeId = ACTIVITY and currentStatusId not in (WF_COMPLETED, WF_TERMINATED, WF_ABORTED) and partyAssign.statusId not in (CAL_DECLINED, CAL_DELEGATED, CAL_COMPLETED, CAL_CANCELLED, PRTYASGN_UNASSIGNED)

service.name: getWorkEffortAssignedActivitiesByRole
service.description: Get WorkEffort Assigned Activities By Role : same condition as getWorkEffortAssignedActivities but on view WorkEffortPartyAssignByRole to be able to have all party roles

service.name: getWorkEffortAssignedActivitiesByGroup
service.description: Get WorkEffort Assigned Activities By Group : same condition as getWorkEffortAssignedActivities but on view WorkEffortPartyAssignByGroup to be able to have all parties associated to userLogin.partyId by PartyRelationship

service.name: getWorkEffortEventsByPeriod
service.description: Get WorkEffort Events by a period specified by periodType attribute (one of the java.util.Calendar field values). Return a Map with periodStart as the key and a Collection of events for that period as value If filterOutCanceledEvents is set to Boolean(true) then workEfforts with currentStatusId=EVENT_CANCELLED will not be returned. To limit the events to a particular partyId, specify the partyId. To limit the events to a set of partyIds, specify a Collection of partyIds.

attribute.name: calendarType
attribute.description: Can be either CAL_PERSONAL or CAL_MANUFACTURING, defaults to CAL_PERSONAL. The value controls the type of work efforts returned. To bypass this behavior, use an invalid value (like VOID).

service.name: removeDuplicateWorkEfforts
service.description: Removes duplicate work efforts from a list of work efforts.

service.name: getProductManufacturingSummaryByFacility
service.description: Create a map with an entry for each facility. The value is another map with information about the manufacturing orders running in the facility for the given product: incoming - incomingProductionRunList, estimatedQuantityTotal. Shows quantity of product to be produced. outgoing - outgoingProductionRunList, estimatedQuantityTotal. Shows quantity of product to be consumed.

service.name: createWorkEffortAssoc
service.description: Create a WorkEffort Assoc, for linking task to describe a project or for linking routing with its routingTasks

service.name: updateWorkEffortAssoc
service.description: Update a WorkEffort Assoc, for linking task to describe a project or for linking routing with its routingTasks

service.name: removeWorkEffortAssoc
service.description: Remove a WorkEffort Assoc, for linking task to describe a project or for linking routing with its routingTasks

service.name: copyWorkEffortAssocs
service.description: Copies WorkEffortAssocs from one WorkEffort to another WorkEffort. Only child WorkEffort associations will be copied.

attribute.name: sourceWorkEffortId
attribute.description: The ID of the WorkEffort to copy the associations from.

attribute.name: targetWorkEffortId
attribute.description: The ID of the WorkEffort to copy the associations to.

attribute.name: excludeExpiredAssocs
attribute.description: Exclude expired WorkEffort associations from copying (Y/N).

attribute.name: copyRelatedValues
attribute.description: Copy WorkEffort related values (Y/N). Used only when deepCopy = Y.

attribute.name: excludeExpiredRelations
attribute.description: Exclude expired WorkEffort related values from copying (Y/N). Used only when deepCopy = Y.

service.name: createWorkEffortAndAssoc
service.description: Creates a WorkEffort entity and WorkEffortAssoc

service.name: updateWorkEffortAndAssoc
service.description: Creates a WorkEffort entity and WorkEffortAssoc

service.name: createWorkEffortGoodStandard
service.description: Create a WorkEffort - Product Assoc, for linking WorkEffort to In or Out Product, for routing it's the link between Manufactured Product with its routings

service.name: updateWorkEffortGoodStandard
service.description: Update a WorkEffort - Product Assoc, for linking WorkEffort to In or Out Product, for routing it's the link between Manufactured Product with its routings

service.name: removeWorkEffortGoodStandard
service.description: Remove a WorkEffort - Product Assoc, for linking WorkEffort to In or Out Product, for routing it's the link between Manufactured Product with its routings

service.name: createCommunicationEventWorkEff
service.description: Creates a CommunicationEvent entity and CommunicationEventWorkEff

service.name: createWorkEffortRequestItemAndRequestItem
service.description: Creates a CustRequestItem entity and CustRequestItemWorkEffort

service.name: checkCustRequestItemExists
service.description: Checks to see if a CustRequestItem exists

service.name: setWorkEffortFixedAssetAssign
service.description: Based on task's estimate dates, write assign entries for the fixed asset the task is assigned to

service.name: createWorkEffortFixedAssetStd
service.description: Creates a WorkEffortFixedAssetStd entry to associate a routing task with a fixed asset (type)

service.name: removeWorkEffortFixedAssetStd
service.description: Removes a WorkEffortFixedAssetStd, thus removing the association between a routing task and a fixed asset (type)

service.name: createWorkEffortFixedAssetAssign
service.description: Create a WorkEffortFixedAssetAssign entry to associate a fixed asset with a work effort (e.g. a production run task)

service.name: removeWorkEffortFixedAssetAssign
service.description: Remove a WorkEffortFixedAssign entry, which removes the association between a fixed asset and a work effort (e.g. a production run task)

service.name: createWorkEffortTextContent
service.description: Creates a Text Document DataResource and Content Records

service.name: updateWorkEffortTextContent
service.description: Update a Text Document DataResource and Content Records

service.name: uploadWorkEffortContentFile
service.description: Upload and attach a file to a WorkEffort

service.name: indexWorkEffortKeywords
service.description: Index the Keywords for a WorkEffort

service.name: createWorkEffortContactMech
service.description: Create WorkEffortContactMech; if contactMechId is not provided, a new contact mech is created (if partyId is set then the new contact mech is also associated to the party)

service.name: processWorkEffortEventReminders
service.description: Process work effort event reminders. This service is run by the job scheduler.

service.name: processWorkEffortEventReminder
service.description: Send a work effort event reminder
